text: Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya
edit: Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya

translations.transtext: 15. When a bhikkhu is having a felt sitting rug made, a piece of old felt a sugata span [25 cm.] on each side is to be incorporated for the sake of discoloring it.
๑๕. อนึ่ง ภิกษุผู้ให้ทำสันถัตสำหรับนั่งพึงถือเอาคืบสุคตโดยรอบแห่งสันถัตเก่าเพื่อทำให้เสียสี
15. When a bhikkhu is getting a sitting-rug made a (round or square piece) of a used rug one sugata-span round must be incorporated in cider to make it unsightly.
